item.description: HAPPY HOUR at La Boca's Restaurant in Middletown starting at 5 pm. This is a new place for us to visit. They are going to have a delicious taco bar plus other appetizers. Come join us after work for a great time and mingle with old and new friends! It's a nice way to end the work week. There is no charge. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to 520 Main Street: I-91 to left Exit 22S (Rt. 9S), continue 5.5 miles, turn right onto Washington St. (Rt. 66), at light on Main Street turn right, facility on right.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside at a table waiting to meet you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Happy Hour
